data.text: @CityNewsOttawa The question one must ask is how a fellow like Randy got elected to a position of responsibility. It reflects more on us than it does not him.
@ComradePowers1 @Specific57 @CityNewsOttawa Nope. We have a brain and common sense unlike you. 🤣🤣🤣 https://t.co/gm6mPhXnZY

@ComradePowers1 @WrinnChris @CityNewsOttawa And here we see how you get your "disruptive" rating. If you're interested in a respectful conversation in the future where you don't rely on false assumptions then let me know. Have a lovely day.
@ComradePowers1 @ElaJMeadows @CityNewsOttawa It isnt about censorship. he made garbage and potentially dangerous ones...

@ComradePowers1 @WrinnChris @CityNewsOttawa This is the type of content he was banned for. Flooding 911 hurts *everyone* not just people who share the same political persuasion as you. https://t.co/dckOYROtx3
